document_data.name: Una el Shoon

document_data.mainbody: '''Una el Shoon''' was a [[Calishite]] woman who was the mother of [[Akkabar Shoon the Younger]], Queen [[Arhymeria Ithal]] of [[Tethyr]], and [[Amahl Shoon I]]. She was the daughter-in-law of [[Akkabar Shoon the Elder]], being married to his oldest son.
